animeDescription: Anthology produced by Adobe Creative Cloud's Japan division to promote their software suite. It showcases the talents of various Japanese experimental animators.
animeStaff: [['Yamakawa Hiroshi', ['Director', 'Animation Director']], ['Takagi Masakatsu', ['Music']], ['Kubo Yuutarou', ['Animation Director']], ['Arakawa Junichi', ['Animation Director']]]
